tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets (
    ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    ticket_description TEXT,
    priority INT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Tickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  ticket_subject VARCHAR(255),
  ticket_description TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Inquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  inquiry_subject VARCHAR(255),
  inquiry_description TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_support_tickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    issue_description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE inquiries (
    inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    inquiry_text TEXT,
    response_text TEXT,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerSupportTickets (
  ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  issue_description TEXT,
  status ENUM('Open', 'Closed'),
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerInquiries (
  inquiry_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
  inquiry_text TEXT,
  response_text TEXT,
  resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE SupportAgents (
  agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_name VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(50),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20),
  department VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE TicketAssignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_id INT,
  agent_id INT,
  assigned_at TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (ticket_id) REFERENCES CustomerSupportTickets(ticket_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES SupportAgents(agent_id)
)

CREATE TABLE TicketHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  ticket_id INT,
  status ENUM('Open', 'Closed'),
  updated_at TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (ticket_id) REFERENCES CustomerSupportTickets(ticket_id)
)
